com.ames.uncover.primary

Class PrimaryRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ames.uncover.primary.PrimaryRequest

  • public class PrimaryRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    Request to the primary data source. PrimaryDataProvider receives this request from the model and must provide the data.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int channel
      The number of the channel (parallel thread) used for sending this request.
      protected int from
      Start of the range, inclusive.
      int page 
      protected Query query
      Data query to fetch.
      protected long sent
      Internal field used by data fetcher.
      protected int to
      End of the range, exclusive.
      protected boolean totalDataCountRequired
      Indicates if the total data count is required.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PrimaryRequest(int from, int to, Query query)
      Build the request assuming total data count is not required (known from the previous responses)
      PrimaryRequest(int from, int to, Query query, boolean totalDataCountRequired)
      Build the request specifying the range, query and if the total data count required

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Get start of the range.

      Internal method used by data fetcher.
      PrimaryRequest setPage(int page)
      Set the page.
      void setSent(long sent)
      Set the time when request has been sent to the primary provider to get the data.
      java.lang.String toString()

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • from

        protected final int from
        Start of the range, inclusive.

      • to

        protected final int to
        End of the range, exclusive.

      • totalDataCountRequired

        protected final boolean totalDataCountRequired
        Indicates if the total data count is required. If false, total data count is known for this query and need not be fetched again.

      • sent

        protected long sent
        Internal field used by data fetcher.

      • query

        protected final Query query
        Data query to fetch.

      • page

        public int page

      • channel

        protected int channel
        The number of the channel (parallel thread) used for sending this request.
